dictionary.message: One of standard kinds of weapon. Affected by the wind (especially, if it was shot with comparatively low initial speed).
Standard grenade. It's quite easy to use as it's not affected by the wind.
Helps to dig the tunnel under the ground. Can be used for causing slight injure to the enemy].
Allows you to dig tunnels under the ground (either horizontally or angularly). Slightly injures and pushes the enemy.
Detonates in 3 seconds after setup, leaving a large hole in the ground. Heavily pushes the enemy.

Explodes in a second after any unit comes in its operating zone. It can be used for defense, or as a source of additional damage. If there was no unit nearby while installing the mine, the turn is not spent.
Simple but very useful weapon, it is remarkable for you can make two shots for one turn with it, that is, you can stop after the first shot and relocate your unit before you make the second shot.
Extremely insidious missile weapon. You can use 4 shurikens for one turn. The first direct hit on every enemy deals double damage.

message.name: SHURIKEN.NOTE
message.value: Ultimately effective, if you throw them to different enemies.

message.name: SHURIKEN.DAMAGE
message.value: 17 hp for the throw. The first direct hit at a target deals double damage.

dictionary.message: Cluster grenade the same as standard is not influenced by the wind. It does damage by fragments from the explosion. It is very effective in enclosed space.

message.name: WEAPON.TIMER
message.value: To switch on the timer use keys '1-5'

message.name: CL_GRENADE.DAMAGE
message.value: 40 hp from explosion, 8 fragments - 15 hp each.

dictionary.message: Another standard weapon. Shoots in short bursts, almost no disperse. Can be controlled while shooting.

message.name: UZI.NOTE
message.value: While shooting you can change the angle of the weapon by 'up/down' keys.

dictionary.message: Weapon, working on the same principle with bazooka. The initial speed can't be regulated. The shell is not influenced by the wind too. In explosion a mortar shoots 5 bombs.

message.name: MORTAR.DAMAGE
message.value: 35 hp from explosion, 5 fragments - 25 hp each.

dictionary.message: Sticky grenade adheres to any surface. In explosion releases several fragments, which are not influenced by the wind and flit to the air.

message.name: STICKY_BOMB.DAMAGE
message.value: 40 hp for explosion, 6 fragments - 20 hp each.

dictionary.message: Powerful weapon of close combat. In careful application it tears enemy to pieces. It shoots with fractions, which have big spreading.
Starts moving in the pointed direction but can turn around if struck into an obstacle or try to jump it over.

message.name: SHEEP.NOTE
message.value: Press space to release the ram and press space again to explode.

dictionary.message: A flying ram. You can control its flight. It explodes when bumps into the ground or any unit.

message.name: SUPER_SHEEP.NOTE
message.value: To start a ram just press space

dictionary.message: More powerful analogue of Uzi. It makes more shots, every shot does greater damage. As a result it has more spreading during the attack.
Shoots a carpet, which bounces several times in a random direction. Unpredictable weapon. It is capable to deal great damage to either an enemy or a teammate.
A rocket, which can be shot at enemies placed under the ground or behind an obstacle! It is influenced by the wind.
Close combat weapon based on the direct impact of electric charge on the biological target.

message.name: SHOCKER.NOTE
message.value: Strongly tosses up a unit. Even more effective if you manage to hit several targets

dictionary.message: Rocket reaches the target by the shortest flight path. It fits perfectly for long distances.

message.name: GUIDING_BAZOOKA.NOTE
message.value: Mark the target by the double mouse click, after that set the direction and the speed of the shot just as for regular bazooka.

dictionary.message: Simplified variant of the holy grenade. The shot power is not regulated. The cannon ball detonates only after full stop. Shooting unit cannot move away after the usage of the cannon.
Behaves just like a grenade. Allows the user to relocate to the place, where the teleport happened to stop after a toss.

message.name: TELE_THROWER.NOTE
message.value: It can be used several times during a turn. After using it you can switch to another weapon.

dictionary.message: It lets you to pass the turn to another member of the team.

message.name: SWITCH_TURN.NOTE
message.value: Use the 'right' and 'left' keys for switching between your team members. Use the 'space' key for choice.

dictionary.message: Spider mine crawls up to an enemy and stands on it. If the enemy moves out, the spider will detonate immediately, dealing severe damage and poisoning the target.

message.name: SPIDER.NOTE
message.value: Spider will explode in 6 sec after moving starts, if there's no enemy on its way. The poison deals damage equal to 5% of the current hp at the end of each turn. Poison can be cured by any medkit. Doesn't cause any damage if the unit has less than 20 hp.

dictionary.message: Always flies upward, breaking down everything on its way. If it comes across a victim, firework will send it straight to the space.

message.name: FIREWORK.NOTE
message.value: It can be used to knock down the enemy, placed above you.

message.name: FIREWORK.DAMAGE
message.value: 50 hp from the explosion. Units that were impaled by the firework also get 20 hp of damage plus the damage of falling to ground.

dictionary.message: Lets you make one precise shot, carefully aiming with the laser beam. It is capable to pierce several enemies at one shot.

message.name: SNIPER_RIFLE.NOTE
message.value: The nearby targets get decreased damage.

message.name: SNIPER_RIFLE.DAMAGE
message.value: 90 hp for the first target, each subsequent target gets lower damage.

dictionary.message: Launched as a grenade. It detonates when it contacts the ground, covering it with flaming mixture.

message.name: MOLOTOV.DAMAGE
message.value: 40 hp out of explosion, ignites the ground.

dictionary.message: It calls the hell upon the Earth! Releases fire jet, which smolders on the ground for some time, burning the enemy. Burn, baby, burn!!!
Strikes with bombs that deal minor damage and ignite the ground.

message.name: AIR_CONTROL.NOTE
message.value: Use 'left' and 'right' keys to specify the direction, where the strike will be delivered.

message.name: NAPALM.DAMAGE
message.value: 5 rockets, 20 hp each. Fire damage 15-75 hp per second.

dictionary.message: Drops 5 rockets at the pointed target. Rockets are not influenced by the wind.
Calls meteor upon the sinful Earth. Meteor falls on the ground at the random angle, in explosion it is broken into 4 fragments.

message.name: METEOR.DAMAGE
message.value: 65 hp out of the strike, 4 fragments, 35 hp each

dictionary.message: Strikes with 3 infernal iranian carpets into the pointed target. Carpets are not influenced by the wind. When hitting the ground, carpets bounce to the random direction.

message.name: CARPET_STRIKE.NOTE
message.value: Use 'left' and 'right' keys to specify the direction, where the carpets should be thrown.

message.name: CARPET_STRIKE.DAMAGE
message.value: 3 carpets, 2 bounces, 50 hp of damage from every strike

dictionary.message: Much more powerful analogue of the cluster grenade. When exploding, watermelon bomb breaks into 6 smaller fragments, which explode contacting the ground

message.name: WATERMELON.DAMAGE
message.value: 80 hp after explosion, 6 fragments, 50 hp each

dictionary.message: Very powerful grenade. It explodes only after full stop. Amen.
The most powerful strike, it drives an enemy in the gloom, taking the 35% of his current hitpoints.
Lets the unit shift to any area, and even under the ground. Does small damage. Spends one turn.
Personal super light flying apparatus of the vertical launch and landing, it lets you rise in the air with the help of jet thrust.

message.name: JETPACK.NOTE
message.value: Restricted fuel stores. After using it you can switch to another weapon.

dictionary.message: A rope which can help you to climb up any obstacle.

message.name: ROPE.NOTE
message.value: It doesn't waste turn, and can be used without limits.

dictionary.message: Hooks up and pulls an enemy, doing damage by electricity while dragging.

message.name: HARPOON.DAMAGE
message.value: 40 hp when the target is hit, 10 hp/4 times per second while dragging.

dictionary.message: A unit, against whom this weapon is used, will be sent flying with a very high initial speed. Ideal to send enemies into the water.
A legendary weapon. It shots with bursts, one bullet can hit 2 enemies.

message.name: KALASH.DAMAGE
message.value: 2 bursts with 4 bullets. Damage of a bullet - 16 hp

dictionary.message: Strategic utility. Girders can be used as bridges, ladders or defensive constructions. Placing the girder doesn't waste your turn.

message.name: GIRDER.NOTE
message.value: Cannot be placed on the ground or near the units.

dictionary.message: Shoots special missile which freezes units within large radius. Missile is affected by the wind.

message.name: FREEZER.NOTE
message.value: Frozen players cannot move, jump or use the rope for 2 turns. Ice block can be melted by fire or shattered by dealing 200 damage.

dictionary.message: Shoots 5 poisoned bolts, which are affected by the wind.

message.name: CROSSBOW.NOTE
message.value: The poison deals damage equal to 5% of the current hit points at the end of each turn. Poison can be cured by any medkit. Doesn't deal any damage if the unit has 20 hp or less remaining.

dictionary.message: Special mine that instantly freezes any unit who dares to approach it.

message.name: FREEZING_MINE.NOTE
message.value: Frozen players cannot move, jump or use the rope for 2 turns. Ice block can be melted by fire or shattered by dealing 200 damage.

dictionary.message: Rocket stuffed with devastating shards that cause minor damage but destroys lots of landmass. Affected by the wind.

message.name: GROUNDBREAKER.DAMAGE
message.value: 50 hp from explosion, 10 shards, 10 hp each

dictionary.message: Special missile that diggs the way down and detonates once it encounters any unit or reaches the water.
Enhanced modification of the bunker buster, destroys ground much stronger.

Defensive device, jumps into the air when enemy approaches and attacks it. Can be triggered only by enemies standing on the ground. If there was no unit nearby while installing the guardian, the turn is not spent.
Absolutely insuperable barrier, no weapon can damage it.
Shoots with sharp discs, which bounce from any obstacle. Disc explodes when it hits the enemy or after performing 4 bounces. Each bounce increases disc damage.
Nice choice for long distances. When you press SPACE while grenade is flying, it jumps up, and its damage is increased. You can do up to 3 jumps.
It's now possible to attack enemy without leaving your hideout! Helicopter carries 4 bombs. Press SPACE, to drop them. If you press SPACE after using all of your bombs, helicopter falls and explodes.

message.name: HELICOPTER.DAMAGE
message.value: Bomb damage - 25 hp, explosion damage - 30 hp.

dictionary.message: UFO is able to pick up and carry all kinds of mines: fly above the mine, press SPACE to capture it, then press SPACE again to release. If you press SPACE above the enemy, UFO falls on him end explodes.
Removes ice from the user and protects him from freezing and slowing for 2 turns. Also heals 50 hp. Spends a turn!
Force field generator which pushes away most kinds of ammo. Doesn't affect rope, harpoon, all kinds of mines, regular sheep, spider mine and UFO. Lasts for 10 turns.
Shoots with your unit at large distance. When the unit hits the ground, a large explosion takes place. Your unit also takes 1/3 of the explosion damage.
When boomerang hits the enemy or the ground, it bounces at your direction, you may try to catch it and throw again. For the second throw, boomerang won't bounce. Greatly affected by the wind.
Under construction
Instantly transfers unit to a random point at a middle range. Doesn't waste a turn. Can be used in the air.
Use the emergency teleport to get out of enclosed spaces without wasting a turn.
Heals half of the damaged received on previous turn. Each unit can be bandaged only once! Doesn't waste a turn.
It's wise to use bandage to counter enemy's combo, which dealt you a considerable damage.
Pushes an enemy with great force. You can shoot just below yourself to make a powerful jump and reach the high ground. Two shots per turn.
Despite low damage, a lucky shot can push your enemy far away. If you manage to hit the enemy while he is in the air, he definitely flies into the water!
Caution! Shoots a powerful energy ball affected by the wind. When it explodes, it fires lightning bolts to each unit in a large range.

message.name: THUNDERBOLT.DAMAGE
message.value: Ball damage: 95 hp, lightning damage: 80 hp.

dictionary.message: You should be very careful using the thunderbolt, as it's easy to damage your teammates with it. Great against groupped enemies or units standing near the wall.
Special devices generating protection beams. Your enemy will suffer damage and loose his turn, if he passes through the beam. Beams don't affect your team members. Doesn't waste a turn.
Barriers do little damage, though they are perfect for defense!
Restores 15 hp for 6 turns. Poison does no damage to you, while you're under antitoxin effect. Doesn't waste a turn.
Use antitoxin to prevent massive poison damage. Try to find a medkit, while you're protected.

Places a special mark on the map without spending a turn. On your next turn a bomb will be dropped at this mark. The bomb emits several explosions to the sides of epicenter. Enemies at the epicenter are poisoned for 10 turns.
This bomb is a powerful weapon, capable to destroy or sink several enemies. Your enemy has a vision of the mark - so make sure he won't be able to leave his position before explosion!
Gas grenade emits a cloud on explosion, which deals poison damage to all units it covers at the end of a turn, ignoring armor, attack, and dodge chance. Cloud lasts for 6 turns.
Can be used to force the enemy to change his position. Great against frozen targets. Remember, cloud damages your units as well, and it's not effective against units with poison protection!
Use left/right keys to change angle. Press and hold space to adjust power. Mind the wind!

Grenade is a good choice, when opponent stands in a deeping at large distance. Change angle with up/down keys. Adjust power by holding the SPACE key. Use 1-5 keys to set timer. Not affected by the wind.
Drill is irreplaceable if you choose Kamikaze tactics. Stand near your opponent and make a tunnel. If you are lucky, your opponent will fall down. Press SPACE to use.
There are two ways to use blow torch: to make your way through the obstacle or to push your opponent to the water. Press SPACE to use. You may change angle with left/right keys while moving.
Dynamite deals great damage and is good to send your opponents to the water. When dynamite is set, you have only few seconds to run away. Press SPACE to set.
Mine doesn't end the turn, if there are no units nearby . So, set up the mine and push your opponent on it for extra damage. Press SPACE to set.
Rifle is good to push your opponents to the water or on the mine. Change angle with up/down keys. Press SPACE to shoot.
You may toss 4 shurikens per turn. To deal maximum damage, try to hit different opponents. Change angle with up/down keys. Press SPACE to throw.
The best way to use cluster grenade is to throw it to an opponent standing in a deeping. Change angle with up/down keys. Adjust power by holding the SPACE key. Use 1-5 keys to set timer.
Uzi deals good damage and can be used to push several opponents off the ground in one turn. Change angle with up/down keys, you can adjust angle even while shooting!. Press SPACE to use.
Mortar is a reliable, predictable weapon with constant power. It does more damage with high angles. Adjust angle with up/down keys. Press SPACE to shoot.
Sticky grenade has a large coverage area and deals great damage in enclosed space. Change angle with up/down keys. Adjust power by holding the SPACE key.
Shotgun is great at close combat. Change angle with up/down keys. Press SPACE to shoot.
Turn in desired direction and prace SPACE to launch. You can manually explode a sheep at any moment by pressing SPACE again. But remember, that sheep are unpredictable!
Press SPACE to launch. You can control the super sheep during the flight by left/right keys.
Minigun deals great damage, but has a low accuracy of fire, so it's better used at short distances. Adjust angle with up/down keys. Press SPACE to shoot.
It's a good idea to shoot carpets at large distances to avoid occasional ricochet hits. Change angle with up/down keys. Adjust power by holding the SPACE key.
Drill rocket comes to help when your enemies are hiding deep under ground. Change angle with up/down keys. Adjust power by holding the SPACE key. Mind the wind!
Shocker is a great weapon for throwing your enemies into the water. Stand next to your opponent and press SPACE to use. Remember that the effect is even greater if you manage to hit multiple targets.
First, double click on the map to set the mark. Then change angle with up/down keys. Adjust initial power with SPACE key.
You cannot move after shooting from cannon, so wisely choose the location. Change angle with up/down keys. Press SPACE to shoot.
Be careful, as portable teleport bounces from the ground and thus may trigger far from desired location .Change angle with up/down keys. Adjust power by holding SPACE key.
The timer doesn't stop while you're selecting the unit, so decide quickly. Pick a unit with left/right keys. Press SPACE to select.
Don't stand near the opponent which has a spider under him - you may receive serious damage when he moves. Press SPACE to launch.
Use the firework to hit an enemy above, no matter how much ground is between you. Press SPACE to set.
Sniper rifle is much less effective in close combat, so shoot only from large distance. Adjust angle with up/down keys. Press SPACE to shoot.
Molotov is a very powerful weapon. Best used against opponents in a deeping. Change angle with up/down keys. Adjust power by holding SPACE key.
Firethrower deals maximum damage, when opponent cannot drop off burning area. Adjust angle with up/down keys. Press SPACE to shoot. Mind the wind!
Change direction of attack with left/right keys. To launch the napalm just double click on the map. Make sure that the enemies won't easily drop off the fire.
Airstrike is good against group of enemies. Change direction of attack with left/right keys. Double click on the map to launch.
Use meteor on open ground only, as the angle of attack is determined randomly. Double click on the map to attack.

Carpet strike is effective against large groups of enemies. Change direction of attack with left/right keys. Double click on the map to launch. Remember that this weapon is very powerful, but unpredictable.

Watermelon has a tremendous power! It's heavier than regualr grenade, flies not so far and bounces from the ground. Change angle with up/down keys. Adjust power by holding SPACE key. Use 1-5 keys to set timer.
You cannot move after throwing holy grenade, so wisely choose the location. Change angle with up/down keys. Adjust power by holding SPACE key.
Sledgehammer literaly nail your opponent down to the ground. You just have to use some fire weapon on your next turn. Stand in front of the enemy and press SPACE to hit.
Teleports your unit to any point on the map. Use it when there are no other ways to escape. Just double click on desired location to use.
Keep in mind, that the fuel is limited and turn timer is ticking. Press SPACE to take off. Use arrow keys to control the flight. Press SPACE again to land.
Rope is used to access the high ground. Change angle with up/down keys. Press SPACE to use.
Harpoon is useful when there is a water or a mine between you and your enemy, you can pull your opponent right there. Change angle with up/down keys. Press SPACE to use
Bat is the best way to send your enemy into a long flight straight to the water. Change angle with up/down keys. Stand in front of the enemy and press SPACE to hit.
Extremly effective in close combat. Change angle with up/down keys. Press SPACE to shoot.
ИUse the girder to protect units that can be easily pushed to the water. Double click on the map to set up. Change angle with up/down keys.
Freezer will immobilize enemies that don't have jetpack or portable teleport. Change angle with up/down keys. Adjust power by holding SPACE key. Mind the wind!
Crossbow is useful at the beginning of the combat against high-level armored enemies. Change angle with up/down keys. Press SPACE to shoot. Mind the wind!
Unlike regular mine, freezing mine triggers immediately. Great in combination with other mines. Press SPACE to set up.
Groundbreaker destroys huge land masses. Be careful, as it is rather unpredictable. Change angle with up/down keys. Adjust power by holding SPACE key. Mind the wind!
Bunker buster is the most effective weapon agains opponents hidden underground. Double click on the map to launch.
Super bunker buster just tears the ground into pieces! Double click on the map to launch.
Guardian is a device that protects you from opponents that decide to come close to you. Press SPACE to set.
Titanium girder is especially useful to protect yourself or to block your opponent. Double click on the map to set up. Change angle with up/down keys.

Disc launcher has good chances to deal massive damage, if you use it against enemy group in enclosed space. Be careful - discs move very fast, and it's hard to dodge your own disc if it bounces in your direction.
Effective on medium and large distances, when you can perform at least 2 jumps. Change angle with up/down keys. Adjust power by holding SPACE key.
Use space key to drop bombs. Don't forget that helicopter deals additional damage with its explosion. If you accidently injure the controlling character, helicopter instantly goes down.
You can use UFO to drag aside enemy's guardians, or take the mines lying on the ground for additional damage. To deal direct damage, place UFO above the enemy and press space.
Even if antifreeze makes you to spend a turn, it's still the best move against ice users.
Force field provides good protection against most ammo, but its power may not be enough to deflect bullets or accelerated air strike.
Great for using by revived zombies and nearly dead units, as it is the easy way to inflict large amounts of damage.
Boomerang's bounce depends on the wind force and throw power. If you don't manage to catch the boomerang, it explodes with the next impact, dealing only half damage.

message.name: HAT.FROST_PROTECTION
message.value: Reduces cold damage and freeze duration

message.name: HAT.DOUBLE_JUMP
message.value: Allows to perform (or improves) double jump

dictionary.message: Magic sphere of uncertain origin. Shoots multiple ice shards while it flies towards its target. Enemies hit by the orb, or by at least 2 shards, are slowed for 2 turns. Orb and shards are affected by wind!

message.name: CHROMEORB.DAMAGE
message.value: 50 hp orb damage, 30 hp shard damage

dictionary.message: Your units are protected from slowing caused by ice shards. Try to slow as much enemies as you can by throwing the orb with the maximum power.

Device that can be attached to any surface, which disables common healing methods for your enemy. Doesn't affect most bosses and rabbit regeneration. If an enemy destroys the blocker, he gets considerable damage. Lasts for 10 turns.

Heal blocker should be used to counter enemiy, who relies too much on medkits and regeneration. Use it, when an enemy digs under the ground to heal. Make sure enemy can't destroy the blocker with mines, try to attach it to high walls or ceiling.
Вызывает энергетическое торнадо, которое добавляет +30 жизней каждому члену команды и увеличивает скорость на два хода.
Зарядись энергией на победу!
Энергетический торнадо способен одновременно лечить сразу всю Вашу команду на любом расстоянии, поэтому крайне прост и эффективен в использовании. Для активации нажмите ПРОБЕЛ.
